heterogeneity note:
"The native ecosystem in these areas is shortgrass steppe with occasional patches of tallgrass and trees that are limited to riparian zones and mesic areas. Because grasshoppers, the focal group in this study, were not found to utilise riparian (composed largely of cattails) and forested habitats, these areas were removed from our estimates of fragment area and were not surveyed. The study fragments were all composed of unmown and ungrazed grassland areas that were surrounded by at least 50% single family subdivisions or
one or two story industrial buildings. In addition, these fragments could also be bordered by heavily mowed regions, greater
than two lane roads and bodies of water"
